title: Starting March 20, entry into the territory of Kozinka, Glotovo, Gora-Podol, Grayvoronovo, Novostroevka 1st and 2nd, Bezymeno...
content: Starting March 20, entry into the territory of Kozinka, Glotovo, Gora-Podol, Grayvoronovo, Novostroevka 1st and 2nd, Bezymeno will be limited, and roadblocks will be set up - Governor of the Belgorod Region Gladkov
author: Live UA Map
